title: Kidou Senshi Gundam U.C. Senki: Tsuioku no Char Aznable
original_name: 機動戦士ガンダム U.C.戦記 追憶のシャア・アズナブル
sinopse:
A collection of three stories that showcase some events of Char Aznable's past and the men fighting around him.

1. Char Senyou Zaku II vs. Rick-Dias (Zaku II Char Aznable Personal Use vs. Rick Diaz)
2. Ryousangata Zaku vs. Gundam (Mass Production Type Zaku vs. Gundam)
   3-5. Char Senyou Zugokku vs. GM (Z'Gok Char Aznable Personal Use vs. GM)
